name: Armenia
laws: Law on Combating Money Laundering and Terrorism Financing

kyc_steps: Collect full legal name and national ID
Verify identity via national eID or passport
Capture purpose of account and expected activity
risk_scoring: Assign risk band based on customer type and industry
EDD for non-resident clients and cash-heavy industries
reporting: STR filing to Financial Monitoring Center

name: Azerbaijan
laws: Law on Combating Legalization of Criminally Obtained Funds

EDD for non-face-to-face onboarding and high-value accounts
